SEARCH
Package com.meteordevelopments.duels.api.folialib.impl

Interface ServerImplementation

All Known Subinterfaces:
PlatformScheduler
All Known Implementing Classes:
FoliaImplementation, LegacyPaperImplementation, LegacySpigotImplementation, PaperImplementation, SpigotImplementation, UnsupportedImplementation
@Deprecated public interface ServerImplementation
Deprecated.
Use PlatformScheduler instead. (forRemoval = true, since = "0.3.5"). Deprecated in favor of better naming.

  • Method Details

    • isOwnedByCurrentRegion

      boolean isOwnedByCurrentRegion(@NotNull org.bukkit.Location location)
      Deprecated.
      Folia: Returns whether the current thread is ticking a region and that the region being ticked owns the chunk at the specified world and block position as included in the specified location. Paper: Returns Bukkit.isPrimaryThread() Spigot: Returns Bukkit.isPrimaryThread()
      Parameters:
      location - Specified location, must have a non-null world
      Returns:
      true if the current thread is ticking the region that owns the chunk at the specified location

    • isOwnedByCurrentRegion

      boolean isOwnedByCurrentRegion(@NotNull org.bukkit.Location location, int squareRadiusChunks)
      Deprecated.
      Folia: Returns whether the current thread is ticking a region and that the region being ticked owns the chunks centered at the specified world and block position as included in the specified location within the specified square radius. Specifically, this function checks that every chunk with position x in [centerX - radius, centerX + radius] and position z in [centerZ - radius, centerZ + radius] is owned by the current ticking region. Paper: Returns Bukkit.isPrimaryThread() Spigot: Returns Bukkit.isPrimaryThread()
      Parameters:
      location - Specified location, must have a non-null world
      squareRadiusChunks - Specified square radius. Must be >= 0. Note that this parameter is not a squared radius, but rather a Chebyshev Distance
      Returns:
      true if the current thread is ticking the region that owns the chunks centered at the specified location within the specified square radius

    • isOwnedByCurrentRegion

      boolean isOwnedByCurrentRegion(@NotNull org.bukkit.block.Block block)
      Deprecated.
      Folia: Returns whether the current thread is ticking a region and that the region being ticked owns the chunk at the specified block position. Paper: Returns Bukkit.isPrimaryThread() Spigot: Returns Bukkit.isPrimaryThread()
      Parameters:
      block - Specified block position
      Returns:
      true if the current thread is ticking the region that owns the chunk at the specified block position

    • isOwnedByCurrentRegion

      boolean isOwnedByCurrentRegion(@NotNull org.bukkit.World world, int chunkX, int chunkZ)
      Deprecated.
      Folia: Returns whether the current thread is ticking a region and that the region being ticked owns the chunk at the specified world and chunk position. Paper: Returns Bukkit.isPrimaryThread() Spigot: Returns Bukkit.isPrimaryThread()
      Parameters:
      world - Specified world
      chunkX - Specified x-coordinate of the chunk position
      chunkZ - Specified z-coordinate of the chunk position
      Returns:
      true if the current thread is ticking the region that owns the chunk at the specified world and chunk position

    • isOwnedByCurrentRegion

      boolean isOwnedByCurrentRegion(@NotNull org.bukkit.World world, int chunkX, int chunkZ, int squareRadiusChunks)
      Deprecated.
      Folia: Returns whether the current thread is ticking a region and that the region being ticked owns the chunks centered at the specified world and chunk position within the specified square radius. Specifically, this function checks that every chunk with position x in [centerX - radius, centerX + radius] and position z in [centerZ - radius, centerZ + radius] is owned by the current ticking region. Paper: Returns Bukkit.isPrimaryThread() Spigot: Returns Bukkit.isPrimaryThread()
      Parameters:
      world - Specified world
      chunkX - Specified x-coordinate of the chunk position
      chunkZ - Specified z-coordinate of the chunk position
      squareRadiusChunks - Specified square radius. Must be >= 0. Note that this parameter is not a squared radius, but rather a Chebyshev Distance.
      Returns:
      true if the current thread is ticking the region that owns the chunks centered at the specified world and chunk position within the specified square radius

    • isOwnedByCurrentRegion

      boolean isOwnedByCurrentRegion(@NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity)
      Deprecated.
      Folia: Returns whether the current thread is ticking a region and that the region being ticked owns the specified entity. Note that this function is the only appropriate method of checking for ownership of an entity, as retrieving the entity's location is undefined unless the entity is owned by the current region. Paper: Returns Bukkit.isPrimaryThread() Spigot: Returns Bukkit.isPrimaryThread()
      Parameters:
      entity - Specified entity
      Returns:
      true if the current thread is ticking the region that owns the specified entity

    • isGlobalTickThread

      boolean isGlobalTickThread()
      Deprecated.
      Folia: Returns whether the current thread is ticking the global region. Paper: Returns Bukkit.isPrimaryThread() Spigot: Returns Bukkit.isPrimaryThread()
      Returns:
      true if the current thread is ticking the global region

      Parameters:

      delay - Delay before execution
      unit - Time unit
      Returns:
      Future when the task is completed, run on the same thread as the task

    • getPlayer

      org.bukkit.entity.Player getPlayer(String name)
      Deprecated.
      Get a player by name (approximately). When using folia, this can be run sync or async. If this is run async on non-folia platforms, it will block until the next tick to get the player safely.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the player
      Returns:
      Player instance or null if not found

    • getPlayerExact

      org.bukkit.entity.Player getPlayerExact(String name)
      Deprecated.
      Get a player by name (exactly) When using folia, this can be run sync or async. If this is run async on non-folia platforms, it will block until the next tick to get the player safely.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the player
      Returns:
      Player instance or null if not found

    • getPlayer

      Deprecated.

      Parameters:
      uuid - UUID of the player
      Returns:
      Player instance or null if not found
